lines.text:
[after blowing Moto's cover]
I'm frightfully sorry. Say, I did let the cat out of the bag, didn't I?
Yes, even the poor animal's tail.

[lifting up the cut telephone cord]
Someone deprived this instrument of all utility.
There's no harm in a man looking his best.
It won't make any difference in your case.
You go and fetch the bobbies.
Yeah, I'll get the police too!
